jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos Comfort
jcr:content.jcr:description: Grundfos COMFORT is our range of hot water supply systems for domestic applications. In this topic you will dive into COMFORT and all the advanced technologies it’s built on.

jcr:content.jcr:title: The Grundfos Sololift2
jcr:content.jcr:description: The Grundfos SOLOLIFT2 is a versatile range of lifting stations for private homes and light commercial buildings. This topic introduces you to the range and looks at its main features and benefits.

jcr:content.jcr:title: The Grundfos MAGNA3
jcr:content.jcr:description: Complete this topic to learn everything you need to know about the Grundfos MAGNA3 circulating pump, including technical details and installer and homeowner benefits.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Pressure Boosters
jcr:content.jcr:description: Get up to speed on Grundfos CM Booster and MQ boosters, including the advanced CME Booster with a variable speed drive for constant pressure comfort.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Tools for Installers
jcr:content.jcr:description: Grundfos provides installers, building operators and homeowners with a range of tools that save time and money. You can explore some of these under this topic.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Basic Principles and Pump Types
jcr:content.jcr:description: Need to refresh your basic knowledge of how pumps work and are categorised? This topic gives you the answers, and presents the main pump types that Grundfos produces.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Water Wells and other Groundwater Applications
jcr:content.jcr:description: Grundfos supplies a broad range of submersible pumps for water wells and other groundwater applications. Complete this topic for an introduction to our SP/SPA, SQ and SQE water well pumps.

jcr:content.jcr:title: The Grundfos Unilift
jcr:content.jcr:description: Discover how the Grundfos Unilift KP, AP/AP-B and CC meets drainage-related needs in a wide range of applications for domestic housing.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Heating
jcr:content.jcr:description: Learn about the different ways heating circulators are used in domestic homes, while getting up to speed on circulator control modes and the Grundfos circulator range.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Hot Water Recirculation
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic provides an introduction to domestic hot water – or DHW – systems, presents the Grundfos Comfort range of hot water re-circulation pumps, and explains how Comfort range pumps are installed and commissioned.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Macerators
jcr:content.jcr:description: Find out how macerators are used in the home, and learn all about the Grundfos Sololift2 range, including how these macerators are installed and commissioned.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Drainage
jcr:content.jcr:description: Drainage pumps are used to empty indoor and outdoor areas of water and other liquids. This topic explains how they work and introduces the Grundfos range of drainage pumps.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Boosting
jcr:content.jcr:description: Find out how booster pumps are used in homes and other small buildings and learn more about the Grundfos boosters.

jcr:content.jcr:title: ALPHA2
jcr:content.jcr:description: The Alpha2 topic teaches you everything you need to know about this classic small circulator - from benefits to installation and control modes.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos Product Center - Working with projects
Grundfos Product Center - Finding spare parts and service kits
Motors and motor protection
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will help you better understand the motors used in pumps and how to protect them to prolong their life.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Pump sizing
jcr:content.jcr:description: Learn how to identify the pump size required for an irrigation zone.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Monitoring and controls
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will help you understand how monitoring and control devices generate high efficiency in complex irrigation systems.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Wastewater  in commercial buildings
jcr:content.jcr:description: Learn all about the most common approaches to wastewater removal in commercial buildings as well as drainage considerations in planning a building.

jcr:content.jcr:title: High efficiency hydronic systems
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic teaches you about the advantages of hydronic systems of forced air systems as well as the basic principles of radiant cooling and heating.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Heating Systems
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic teaches you about heating systems in commercial buildings with a special focus on balancing and the advantages of using intelligent pump solutions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: CM Booster Self-Priming
jcr:content.jcr:description: The CM Booster is now Self Priming, this topic will guide you through what this means and how it will benefit you.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Water boosting in commercial buildings
jcr:content.jcr:description: In this topic you will learn about pressure boosting and how you can increase comfort and bring down operational costs by choosing the optimum solution.

jcr:content.jcr:title: SCALA2 water booster pump
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will introduce you to the applications and benefits of the water booster pump, SCALA2, including the concept of perfect water pressure.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Groundwater Pumping
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will provide you with all you need to know about groundwater intake, including pump sizing, efficiency optimisation, performance regulation and life-extending precautions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: The basics of desalination
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will provide you with an understanding of how desalination systems work, why commissioning pays off and how to turn brine into pure energy.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Introduction to temperature control
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will give a quick introduction to temperature control systems, including how to optimise and what to be aware of when designing a system.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Boiler systems
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic offers insights on what to be aware of when designing steam boiler systems and how to ensure efficient level control in the boiler.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Buildings Information Modeling
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic introduces Buildings Information Modeling (BIM) to explain what it is and what it does. It also considers some of the challenges of BIM, and how Grundfos’ data-light approach addresses these challenges to provide more efficient solutions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Industrial Water Treatment
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic offers a general introduction to water treatment in industrial processes, including a more detailed survey of the different process steps.

jcr:content.jcr:title: An extended look at Building Information Modeling (BIM)
Applying proportional pressure in water boosting systems
